item.description:
EVENT: Join us in celebrating Chanukah! We'll be doing all of the fun things that made Chanukah your favorite Jewish holiday when you were a kid. We'll light the chanukia, say the blessings, and sing your favorite Chanukah songs. Of course we'll also eat the traditional holiday favorites, latkes and sufganiyot (jelly donuts) as well as other items like, cut up vegetables, cheese & crackers. Bring your own chanukia and candles for this 4th night of chanukah. We'll provide dreidels for those who want to spin... and winners can take home their accumulated gelt!
RSVP: Mandatory by Wednesday December 1st. Party is at a private home in Newton; location and directions will be sent to registered attendees. Please consider bringing a non-perishable food or toiletry contribution for Family Table, greater Bostonâ€™s Jewish food pantry. (No meat or shellfish ingredients, please.)
Event Coordinator: David Goldsmith

MEET: 4pm - 7pm
COST: $13 if you are a non-paid members or guest, otherwise $8. The party and non-member fee will be waived for anyone who joins Mosaic of Mass as a full member ($25) at the party- we'll have membership forms available. You can pay via paypal by going to our website (mosaicofmass.org) for the link that is in the Chanukah party event listing, or make a payment at the Party.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Annual Mosaic Chanukah Party
